snippet.title: A Crisis PR Take on Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. Inside a Litigation PR and Nightmare
snippet.description: Crisis manager Evan Nierman shares a crisis PR perspective on the Johnny Depp libel trial. In this video, Red Banyan’s CEO explores the potential promises and pitfalls of seeking to address crisis PR issues in court. Red Banyan is an international crisis communications agency that utilizes its proprietary approach to help clients press the truth, seize the initiative and triumph in the court of public opinion. Learn more at https://redbanyan.com/
